summary.para: Provides properties for the ReportPartBookMark property of the ReportPartBookmarkNavigationEventArgs class.
Gets the data sub tree of the report.
Gets the name of the object the user has drilled down on.
Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier to identify the requested report.
Specifies the horizontal alignment for text in the HorizontalAlignment property of the ObjectFormat class.
Aligns to the decimal in a numeric value.
Aligns to the default alignment setting.
Aligns to the center of the available space horizontally.
Aligns to the left and right edge.
Aligns to the left edge.
Aligns to the right edge.
Specifies the AM PM format in the AMPMFormat property of the TimeFieldFormat class.
Placement for the AM or PM symbols in the time field appear after the time.
Placement for the AM or PM symbols in the time field appear before the time.
Specifies the kind of area or section in the Kind property of the Area class and Section class, and the ExcelAreaType property of the ExcelFormatOptions class.
Area is a details section.
Area is a group footer.
Area is a group header.
Area is a page footer.
Area is a page header.
Area is a report footer.
Area is a report header.
Specifies the Boolean output type in the OutputType property of the BooleanFieldFormat class.
Boolean value to be displayed as a 1 or 0. 1 = True, 0 = False.
Boolean value to be displayed as a T or F. T = True, F = False.
Boolean value to be displayed as True or False.
Boolean value to be displayed as Yes or No. Yes = True, No = False.
Boolean value to be displayed as a Y or N. Y = True, N = False.
Provides properties for retrieving and setting options for connecting to database servers or ODBC data sources.
Gets or sets the name of the database.
Determines whether the database connection will use integrated security.
Gets or sets the password for logging on to the data source.
Gets or sets the name of the server or ODBC data source where the database is located.
Gets or sets a user name for logging on to the data source.
Specifies the currency symbol in the CurrencySymbolFormat property of the NumericFieldFormat class.
Position of currency symbol to be at the far left of the field. Extra spaces will be left between the symbol and the currency value if the field is justified to the right.
Position of currency symbol to be as close to the currency amount as possible.
Currency symbol will not be displayed.
Contains the ConnectionInfo instances for every connection in the report.
Gets the object at the specified index. In C#, this property is the indexer for the IConnectionInfo class.
Gets the object with the specified server and database names. In C#, this property is the indexer for the IConnectionInfo class.
Gets the object with the specified server and database names. Use this method to optionally ignore case on the database name. In C#, this property is the indexer for the IConnectionInfo class.
Specifies the date time condition for a group in the DateTimeGroupCondition property of the DateTimeGroupOptions class.
Data is grouped in yearly intervals.
Data is grouped in two-week intervals.
Data is grouped in half-day intervals.
Data is grouped in hourly intervals.
Data is grouped in 60-second intervals.
Data is grouped by the second.
Data is grouped on a daily interval.
Data is grouped in monthly intervals.
Data is grouped in 3-month intervals.
Data is grouped in 6-month intervals.
Data is grouped in half-month intervals.
Data is grouped in weekly intervals.
Specifies the day format in the DayFormat property of the DateFieldFormat class.
Single digit days will be printed with a leading zero.
Day is not printed.
Day is printed in numeric format with no leading zero.
Specifies the default values for the DefaultValueSortMethod property of the ParameterField class and ParameterFieldDefinition class.
Sort parameter values based on their descriptions.
Sort parameter values based on their values.
Specifies the default values for the DefaultValueSortOrder property of the ParameterField class and ParameterFieldDefinition class.
Sort parameter values alphabetically in ascending order.
Sort parameter values alphabetically in descending order.
Sort parameter values chronologically in ascending order.
Sort parameter values chronologically in descending order.
Do not sort parameter values.
Sort parameter values numerically in ascending order.
Sort parameter values numerically in descending order.

Specifies whether the parameter value is discrete, ranged, or both in the PromptingType property of the ParameterField class and in the DiscreteOrRangeKind property of the ParameterFieldDefinition class.
Parameter contains discrete and range values.
Parameter contains discrete values only.
Parameter contains range values only.
Provides properties for retrieving and setting the file name when exporting to disk.
Gets or sets the location of the file name.
The EnterpriseReport class is a managed component that acts as a proxy to the EnterpriseReportService class while providing a limited object model to the developer.
Gets or sets the machine name of the APS server.
Gets or sets the authentication type. Valid values are secEnterprise and secWindowsNT.
Gets or sets the machine name of the CMS server.
Gets or sets the logon token used by the report.
Gets or sets the unique object ID that identifies the report.
Gets the name of the Enterprise report or Enterprise folder.
Gets the type of the Enterprise Report.
Gets or sets the logon password.
Gets or sets the user name.
Gets or sets the machine name of the Web Connector Server.
Gets or sets the URL to the EnterpriseReportService Web service.
Specifies the object type in the ObjectType property of the EnterpriseReport class.
Indicates that the object is an Enterprise folder.
Indicates that the object is invalid.
Indicates that object is an Enterprise report.
Indicates that the object is an unknown Enterprise object type, but not a container.
Indicates that the object is an unknown Enterprise object type that is a container.
Specifies the object type in the ObjectType property of the ServerFileReport Class.
Indicates that the object is a Server File folder.
Indicates that the object is invalid.
Indicates that object is a Server File report.
Specifies the type of errors to log in the EnableEventLog method of the ReportDocument class.
Indicates that event logging will record Crystal Report Print Engine API errors.
Indicates that event logging will record Crystal Report Print Engine errors.
Indicates that there will be no event logging.
Provides properties for retrieving and setting options when exporting to Excel.
Gets or sets the base area group number if the area type is group area.
Gets or sets the area type if not using constant column width.
Gets or sets the column width.
Gets or sets export to Excel to have column headings option.
Gets or sets export to Excel to use constant column width.
Gets or sets the first page number.
Gets or sets the last page number.
Gets or sets whether the page range should be used.
Provides data for the Exception event.
Gets or sets whether the event was handled. Set to true if you do not want the default action to occur.
Specifies the exchange destination type in the DestinationType property of the ExchangeFolderDestinationOptions class.
Destination is a message post in an exchange folder.
Provides properties for retrieving and setting options when exporting to Microsoft exchange folders.
Gets or sets the export destination type.
Gets or sets the path of the Exchange folder for reports exported to Exchange
Gets or sets Exchange password.
Gets or sets a user profile for accessing an Exchange folder for reports exported to Exchange.
Specifies the export destination type in the ExportDestinationType property of the ExportOptions class.
Export destination is to a disk file.
Export destination is to an exchange folder.
Export destination is to Microsoft mail (MAPI).
No Export destination type set.
Specifies the export format type in the ExportFormatType property of the ExportOptions class.
Export format of the report is a Crystal Report file.
Export format of the report is a Microsoft Excel file.
Export format of the report is an Excel Record file.
Export format of the report is an HTML 3.2 file.
Export format of the report is an HTML 4.0 file.
No export format specified.
Export format of the report is a PDF file.
Export format of the report is a rich text file.
Export format of the report is a Microsoft Word file.
Provides properties for retrieving and setting options for exporting your report.
Creates options for the DiskFileDestinationOptions for the report's export.
Creates options for the ExcelFormatOptions for the report's export.
Creates options for the ExchangeFolderDestinationOptions for the report's export.
Creates options for the HTMLFormatOptions for the report's export.
Creates options for the MicrosoftMailDestinationOptions for the report's export.
Creates options for the PdfRtfWordFormatOptions for the report's export.
Gets or sets the DestinationOptions.
Gets or sets the options for the destination of the export for the report.
Gets or sets the export destination type.
Gets or sets the ExportFormatOptions.
Gets or sets the export format type.
Gets or sets the FormatOptions.
Specifies the field kind in the Kind property of the FieldDefinition class and all classes derived from FieldDefinition.
The field is a database field.
The field is a formula.
The field is a group name field.
The field is a parameter.
The field is a running total.
The field is a special variable.
The field is a SQL expression.
The field is a summary.
Specifies the field value type in the ValueType property of the FieldDefinition Class and all classes derived from FieldDefinition.
Field contains Windows bitmap data.
Field contains blob data.
Field contains either a true or false value.
Field contains a chart object.
Field contains a currency value.
Field contains a date value.
Field contains a date-time value.
Field contains an icon.
Field contains a 16-bit integer with a value between -32768 and 32767.
Field contains an unsigned 16-bit integer with a value between 0 and 65535.
Field contains a 32-bit integer with a value between -2147483648 and 2147483647.
Field contains a 32-bit integer with a value between 0 and 4294967295.
Field contains an 8-bit integer with a value between -128 and 127.
Field contains an 8-bit integer with a value between 0 and 255.
Field contains a number with decimal places.
Field contains an OLE object.
Field contains a Memo field (string greater then 255 characters).
Field contains a picture.
Field contains string data.
Field contains time data.
Field contains a transient Memo field (string greater then 255 characters).
Field type is unknown.
Provides properties for retrieving and setting display options for the group tree view.
Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) file that specifies the display styles for the group tree view.
Gets or sets the height of the group tree view.
Gets or sets if lines are shown in the group tree view.
Gets or sets the width of the group tree view.
Specifies the hour format in the HourFormat property of the TimeFieldFormat class.
Hour is not displayed.
Hour is displayed in numerical format with no leading 0.
Single digit hours are displayed with a leading zero.
Provides properties for retrieving and setting options when exporting to HTML.
Gets or sets the first page of the report to export.
Gets or sets the HTML folder name to export to.
Gets or sets the option to create separate pages when exporting to HTML format.
Gets or sets the HTML file name to export to.
Gets or sets the option to display a page navigator on each page of a report exported to HTML format.
Gets or sets the last page of the report to export.
Gets or sets if the FirstPageNumber and LastPageNumber should be used.
Provides properties for retrieving options and methods for setting options for connecting to database servers or ODBC data sources.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Shared.IConnectionInfo.SetConnection(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Sets the connection information for connections that use Integrated Security.

member.param: Set to True to use Integrated Security.

summary.para: Sets the connection information.
Sets the logon information in the connection information.
Gets the name of the database.
Determines whether the database connection will use integrated security.
Gets the password for logging on to the data source.
Gets the name of the server or ODBC data source where the database is located.
Gets the user name for logging on to the data source.

Specifies the bottom, left, right, and top line styles in the BottomLineStyle, LeftLineStyle, RightLineStyle, and TopLineStyle properties of the Border class and the DrawingObject class, including all classes derived from DrawingObject.
Line is invisible.
Line is dashed.
Line is dotted.
Line is doubled.
No line type specified.
Line is single.
Specifies the link join type in the JoinType property of the TableLinks class.
Includes all the records where the linked field value in both tables is an exact match.
Includes all records in which the linked field value in the primary table is greater than or equal to the linked field value in the lookup table.
Includes all records in which the linked field value in the primary table is greater than the linked field value in the lookup table.
Includes all the records in which the linked field value in both tables is an exact match and every record in the primary for which there is no match.
Includes all records in which the linked field value in the primary table is less than or equal to the linked field value in the lookup table.
Includes all records in which the linked field value in the primary table is less than the linked field value in the lookup table.
Includes all records in which the linked field value in the primary table is not equal to the linked field value in the lookup table.
Includes all the records in which the linked field value in both tables is an exact match and every record in the lookup table for which there is no match.
Provides properties for retrieving and setting options when exporting to Microsoft mail.
Gets or sets a carbon copy (CC) list for reports e-mailed.
Gets or sets the e-mail message included with e-mailed reports.
Gets or sets the e-mail subject heading for reports being e-mailed
Gets or sets the to list for reports being e-mailed.
Gets or sets the Password to use when logging on to the email account.
Gets or sets the user name to use when logging on to the email account.
Specifies the minute format in the MinuteFormat property of the DateFieldFormat class.
Minutes are not displayed.
Single digit minutes are displayed with a leading zero.
Minutes are displayed in numerical format, with no leading zero.
Specifies the month format in the MonthFormat property of the DateFieldFormat class.
Month is printed as a number with a leading 0, for single digit months.
Month is printed as text.
Month is not printed.
Month is printed as a number with no leading 0.
Month is printed as text in abbreviated format.
Specifies the negative format in the NegativeFormat property of the NumericFieldFormat class.
Negative values in parentheses.
Minus sign appears to the left of the value.
Negative numbers print as a positive value.
Minus sign appears to the right of the value.
Specifies the object scope for the ReportDocument SetCSSClass method.
All report objects in a report.
All report objects in every detail section of a report.
All report objects in every group footer section of a report.
All report objects in every group header section of a report.
All report objects in every page footer section of a report.
All report objects in every page header section of a report.
All report objects in every report footer section of a report.
All report objects in every report header section of a report.

All page footer sections of a report.
All page header sections of a report.
All report footer sections of a report.
All report header sections of a report.

Specifies the report is to be opened exclusively.
Specifies a temporary copy of the report is to be opened.

Size of the bottom margin.
Size of the left margin.
Size of the right margin.
Size of the top margin.

Orientation of report will be taken from printers default settings.
Orientation of report will be landscape.
Orientation of report will be portrait.

Default size set in the printer driver.
10- by 14-inch sheet.
11- by 17-inch sheet.

A4 sheet, 210- by 297-millimeters.
A4 small sheet, 210- by 297-millimeters.
A5 sheet, 148- by 210-millimeters.

D Sheet, 22- by 34-inches.
#10 Envelope, 4 1/8- by 9 1/2-inches.

#12 Envelope, 4 3/4- by 11-inches.
#14 Envelope, 5- by 11 1/2-inches.

B6 Envelope, 176- by 125-millimeters.

C65 Envelope, 114- by 229-millimeters.
DL Envelope, 110- by 220-millimeters.
Italy Envelope, 110- by 230-millimeters.
Monarch Envelope, 3 7/8- by 7 1/2-inches.
6 3/4 Envelope, 3 5/8- by 6 1/2-inches.
E Sheet, 34- by 44-inches.
Executive, 7 1/4- by 10 1/2-inches.
German Legal Fanfold, 8 ½- by 13-inches.
German Std Fanfold, 8 1/2- by 12-inches.
US Std Fanfold, 14 7/8- by 11-inches.
Folio, 8 1/2- by 13-inch paper.
Ledger, 17- by 11-inches.
Legal, 8 1/2- by 14-inches.
Letter, 8 1/2- by 11-inches.
Letter Small, 8 1/2- by 11-inches.
Note, 8 1/2- by 11-inches.
Quarto, 215- by 275-millimeter paper.
Statement, 5 1/2- by 8 1/2-inches.
Tabloid, 11- by 17-inches.

Prints from to the tray the printer auto-selects.
Prints from the cassette tray.
Prints from the envelope tray.

Prints from lower paper tray.

Prints from the tractor feed.

Provides properties for retrieving and setting discrete value parameters.
Gets or Sets a description of the discrete parameter value.
Gets or sets the value of the parameter. This can be a string, number, currency, Boolean or date.

Gets or sets the current values through the ParameterValues collection.

Gets or sets the default values through the ParameterValues collection.

Gets the order in which the default values are sorted.
Gets or sets whether or not the parameter field contains discrete values, range values, or both.
Gets or sets an edit mask that restricts what may be entered for string parameters.
Gets or sets the option to allow editing of default values.
Gets or sets the option to allow multiple values in the parameter.

Gets or sets if the parameter has a current value.
Gets or sets the maximum value.
Gets or sets the minimum value.
Gets or sets the name of the parameter field.

Gets or Sets the type of the parameter value.

Gets or sets the type of the parameter.

Gets or sets the type of the parameter.

Field returns the date that the report was last refreshed.
Field returns the time that the report was last refreshed.

Specifies the summary operation type in the Operation property of the RunningTotalFieldDefinition class and SummaryFieldDefinition class.
Summary returns the average of a field.
Summary returns the correlation of two fields.
Summary counts the number of values, from the field.
Summary returns the measure of the linear relation between paired variables.
Summary returns the number of non-repeating values, from the field.
Summary returns the largest value from the field.
Summary returns the middle value in a sequence of numeric values.
Summary returns the smallest value from the field.
Summary returns the most frequently returning value from the field.
Summary returns the Nth largest value from the field.
Summary returns the Nth most commonly occurring value from the field.
Summary returns the Nth smallest value from the field.
Summary returns as a percentage of the grand total summary.
Summary returns the value for a specified percentile in a Number or Currency field.
Summary returns how much each value in the field deviate from the mean or average value for that field.
Summary returns the square of the standard deviation.
Summary returns the sample standard deviation for the field.
Summary returns the sample variance for the field.
Summary returns the total of all the values for the field.
Summary returns the weighted average for the field.

AfterRenderContentEventHandler is the delegate class for the AfterRenderContentEvent class.
Provides data for the AfterRender event.
Gets or sets the string that will be appended to the end of the HTML.
Represents the method that will handle the AfterRender event.
Provides data for the AfterRenderObject event.
Gets or sets the cached report object.
Gets or sets the HTML renderer object, which generates the resulting HTML.
Represents the method that will handle the AfterRenderObject event.
Provides data for the BeforeRenderContent Class event.
Gets or sets the string that will be written immediately following the <BODY> tag.
Gets or sets whether to render the <BODY> tag.
Represents the method that will handle the BeforeRenderContent event.
Provides data for the BeforeRender event.
Gets or sets the string that will be written after the <HTML> tag but before the <BODY> tag.
Gets or sets whether to render the <HTML> tag.
Represents the method that will handle the BeforeRender event.
Provides data for the BeforeRenderObject event.
Gets or sets the cached report object. This can be a FieldObject, TextObject, GraphObject, and so on.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the contents of an object are made to appear out of focus. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when an object is clicked. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the context menu is displayed. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when an object is double-clicked. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed at the end of a drag operation. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when an object is dragged into the controls bounds. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed during a drag operation. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when an object is dragged out of the controls bounds. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when a control is being dragged over a target object. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed at the start of a drag operation. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the drag and drop operation is complete. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the object receives focus. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed just prior to the object receiving focus. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed immediately after the object loses focus. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when an alphanumeric key is pressed. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when a key is pressed. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when a key is released. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when an object is clicked with either mouse button. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the mouse pointer is moved into the boundaries of an object. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the mouse pointer is moved outside of the boundaries of an object. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the mouse pointer is moved over an object. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the mouse pointer is moved outside of the boundaries of an object. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the mouse pointer is moved into an object. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when either mouse button is released over an object. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the current selection changes. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the selection state of the document changes. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the object is being selected. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Gets or sets the JavaScript code that is executed when the user clicks the stop button or leaves the web page. The code is cached on the client in the HTML page.
Represents the method that will handle the BeforeRenderObject event.
Provides data for the OnRenderScript event.
Gets or sets whether the event was handled.
Gets or sets the Script Block.
Represents the method that will handle the OnRenderScript event.
Provides data for the OnRenderStyle event.
Gets or sets whether the event was handled.
Provides data for the OnRenderStyle event.
Represents the method that will handle the OnRenderStyle event.
